title: Fewer Americans think smoking a pack a day poses a great health risk

title_detail.value: Fewer Americans think smoking a pack a day poses a great health risk

summary: About 3 out of 4 Americans agree that smoking cigarettes causes health problems, but public perception of the risks posed by smoking may be declining, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: About 3 out of 4 Americans agree that smoking cigarettes causes health problems, but public perception of the risks posed by smoking may be declining, according to a new study.
